synopsis.text: Tokeshu, a clandestine ninja collective, lurks in the shadows of modern-day Tokyo, a bustling metropolis teeming with dreams and desires. Armed with ancient techniques passed down through generations, these skilled warriors are tasked with combating the sinister 'darkness' that threatens to engulf the city. As a spin-off of the popular Yami Shibai series, this anime masterfully blends urban legends and horror elements to create a thrilling and suspenseful narrative. Join the Tokeshu on their perilous missions to eradicate the supernatural forces that plague the city and protect its unsuspecting inhabitants. Will they succeed in vanquishing the darkness that looms over Tokyo? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
